Front Counter Attendant job - PARKSVILLE - McDonalds Restaurant
Front Counter Attendant (Expired) McDonalds Restaurant PARKSVILLE Front Counter Attendant McDonalds Restaurant Terms Wages Hours/wk Part Time $8.00-$12.00 10+ Term of Job Date Posted Job ID 10/26/2009 8390 Requirements: Front Counter Attendants perform the following duties: take customers' order, receive payment, assemble and serve the order, stock refrigerated and dry products, ensure service areas are cleaned according to corporate procedures and uses approved cleaning agents. The Front Counter Attendant adheres to corporate sanitation procedures and policies, ensures appearance is neat, professional and clean at all times. Applicants must be available to work evenings and week-ends. We strive to create a team environment, regular wage and performance reviews. Perks include 50 % Employee Food Discount and free uniforms. How To Apply: Please apply with resume in person to McDonalds Restaurant, 310 W Island Hwy, Parksville, BC - Attention: Manager on Duty. Deadline is November 25, 2009.
